feed.title: Track Awesome Captcha Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: :key: Curated list of awesome captcha libraries and crack tools.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Oct 04, 2023
entry.content:
Libraries

  • patchca - Simple yet powerful CAPTCHA library written in Java.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Nov 30, 2021
entry.content:
Generation

  • captcha-api - Free, fast and reliable Captcha API POWERED BY AI

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on May 17, 2020
entry.content:
Generation

  • koto-bank/kocaptcha (‚≠ê58) - A simple captcha service with a single API endpoint, written in Rust.
  • Captcheck - Lightweight, self-hostable CAPTCHA service written in PHP 7 and MySQL. Uses a selection of icons from Font-Awesome. Text-only accessibility mode and support for keyboard-only operation.
  • Securimage - Open-source free PHP Captcha script.
  • Lokno/click-captcha (‚≠ê1) - A visual, click-based CAPTCHA for human authentication.
  • ArgoZhang/SliderCaptcha (‚≠ê286) - Slider captcha supporting mobile.

Other / Chinese

  • Hashcash for PHP/JavaScript forms (‚≠ê56) - An alternative to captcha to fight spam, based on proof-of-work.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Feb 22, 2019
entry.content:
Crack / General

  • kerlomz/captcha_trainer (‚≠ê3.1k) - Based on CNN5/DenseNet+BLSTM/LSTM+CTC to realize verification code identification. Only for training the model.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Feb 02, 2019
entry.content:
Libraries

  • lorien/captcha_solver (‚≠ê250) - Universal python API to different captcha solving services.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Dec 13, 2018
entry.content:
Crack / General

  • dessant/buster (‚≠ê8.6k) - Captcha solver extension for humans and monsters.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Dec 07, 2018
entry.content:
Crack / General

  • arunpatala/captcha (‚≠ê181) - Breaking captchas using torch.
  • zakizhou/CAPTCHA (‚≠ê68) - Implement classification for CAPTCHA in TensorFlow.
  • nladuo/captcha-break (‚≠ê732) - Captcha break based on opencv2, tesseract-ocr and some machine learning algorithm.
  • ypwhs/captcha_break (‚≠ê2.8k) - Captcha break using CNN with Keras.
  • ptigas/simple-captcha-solver (‚≠ê575) - Simple CAPTCHA solver in python üêç.
  • rickyhan/SimGAN-Captcha (‚≠ê436) - Solve captcha without manually labeling a training set.
  • arunpatala/captcha.irctc (‚≠ê213) - Reading irctc captchas with 98% accuracy using deep learning.
  • JackonYang/captcha-tensorflow (‚≠ê1k) - Image Captcha Solving Using TensorFlow and CNN Model.
  • skyduy/CNN_keras (‚≠ê293) - CNN | Keras | CAPTCHA recognitionÔºàÂç∑ÁßØÁ•ûÁªèÁΩëÁªú„ÄÅKerasÊ°ÜÊû∂„ÄÅÈ™åËØÅÁ†ÅËØÜÂà´Ôºâ.
  • PatrickLib/captcha_recognize (‚≠ê568) - Image Recognition captcha without image segmentation.
  • zhengwh/captcha-svm (‚≠ê207) - Use svm to hack simple captcha.
  • chxj1992/captcha_cracker (‚≠ê198) - Crack captcha with CNN.
  • chxj1992/slide_captcha_cracker (‚≠ê144) - Crack solution for slide captcha with Canny algorithm.
  • JasonLiTW/simple-railway-captcha-solver#english-version (‚≠ê818) - Simple captcha solver based on CNN and a training set generator by imitating the style of captcha.
  • lllcho/CAPTCHA-breaking (‚≠ê223) - Breaking the captcha.

Crack / Chinese

  • burness/chinese_hand_write_rec (‚≠ê1.1k) - Handwritten chinese recognition.
  • taosir/cnn_handwritten_chinese_recognition (‚≠ê538) - As the name shows, handwritten_chinese_recognition with cnn.
  • soloice/Chinese-Character-Recognition (‚≠ê205) - This project shows how to use CNN to perform Chinese character recognition, a much more complicated task compared to MNIST digit recognition.
  • muchrooms/zheye (‚≠ê800) - Chinese captcha recognition program for handstand character of zhihu.
  • aaronshan/12306-captcha (‚≠ê285) - Recognize 12306 captcha with deep learning.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Nov 23, 2018
entry.content:
Generation

  • dchest/captcha (‚≠ê2k) - Go package captcha implements generation and verification of image and audio CAPTCHAs.
  • lepture/captcha (‚≠ê1.1k) - A captcha library that generates audio and image CAPTCHAs.
  • lemonce/svg-captcha (‚≠ê1.9k) - Generate svg captcha in Node.js.
  • DoubleSpout/ccap (‚≠ê478) - Node.js generate captcha using c++ library CImg without install any other lib or software.
  • contra/captchagen (‚≠ê184) - Captcha generation for Node.js.
  • jineshfrancs/CaptchaImageView (‚≠ê613) - Custom ImageView to generate captcha image.
  • mcxtzhang/SwipeCaptcha (‚≠ê710) - Swipe captcha of Android platform.
  • mojocn/base64Captcha (‚≠ê2.3k) - Golang base64-captcha supports digits, numbers,alphabet, arithmetic, audio and digit-alphabet captcha.

Crack / Chinese

  • nickliqian/cnn_captcha (‚≠ê2.8k) - Use cnn recognize captcha by tensorflow.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Aug 23, 2018
entry.content:
Libraries

  • mewebstudio/captcha (‚≠ê2.5k) - Captcha for Laravel 5.
  • CGregwar/Captcha (‚≠ê1.8k) - PHP Captcha library.
  • trekjs/captcha (‚≠ê468) - A Lightweight Pure JavaScript Captcha for Node.js. No C/C++, No ImageMagick, No Canvas.
  • google/recaptcha (‚≠ê3.5k) - PHP client library for reCAPTCHA, a free service to protect your website from spam and abuse.
  • ambethia/recaptcha (‚≠ê2k) - ReCaptcha helpers for ruby apps.
  • anhskohbo/no-captcha (‚≠ê1.8k) - No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA For Laravel.

Crack / General

  • ecthros/uncaptcha (‚≠ê2.8k) - Defeating Google's audio reCaptcha with 85% accuracy.

entry.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Jun 07, 2018
entry.content:
Tools / Chinese

  • Tesseract (‚≠ê68k) - Tesseract Open Source OCR Engine.
  • Negative-captcha (‚≠ê787) - A plugin to make the process of creating a negative captcha in Rails much less painful.
  • Django-simple-captcha (‚≠ê1.4k) - An extremely simple, yet highly customizable Django application to add captcha images to any Django form.
  • Securimage (‚≠ê572) - PHP CAPTCHA Script.
  • Captcha_solver (‚≠ê250) - Univeral API to captcha solving services.

Other / Chinese

  • VisualCaptcha (‚≠ê403) - A collection of all the different versions/repos of visualCaptcha.

entry.content:
